name: The Ultimate Quiz: Volume 1
overview: A quiz game created by the team at AGAS Productions headed by Andy Gibson, with AMOS and released in 1994. It is the precursor to The Ultimate Quiz II and was released via licenseware and later in compilations such as F1 Licenceware CD-Rom Volume One F1-001 To F1-100. It had multiple categories, similar to later Trivial Pursuit versions to choose from such as Pop Music, Star Trek, Dr. Who, Movies, Red Dwarf, General Knowledge, Astronomy, TV Programs and Hitchhikers Guide to the Galaxy.
